abstract.p: Hitachi Ltd will transfer its fiber optic components business unit into new company to be called OpNext Inc, joint venture with Clarity Group; Clarity will invest up to $450 milion in new company (S)

block.p: Hitachi Ltd., Japan's largest electronics maker, said yesterday that it would transfer its fiber optic components business unit into a new company to be called OpNext Inc., a joint venture with Clarity Group. Clarity Group itself is a joint venture between the Los Angeles-based Clarity Partners, a new fund that invests in media and communications companies and the Marubeni Group of Japan. Clarity Group will invest up to $450 million in the new company.
